meanings.definition: Relating to a substance that exhibits spontaneous electric polarization.
meanings.sent1: The ferroelectric material generated its own electric charge.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the ferroelectric properties of the crystal.
meanings.sent3: The ferroelectric teddy bear seemed to attract static electricity.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was like a ferroelectric magnet, drawing people towards her.
meanings.sent5: The ferroelectric effect in the experiment was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: A material that can retain a permanent electric polarization.
meanings.sent1: The ferroelectric was used in the construction of the new device.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are exploring the applications of ferroelectrics in technology.
meanings.sent3: The ferroelectric in the lab accidentally shocked the scientist.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty was a ferroelectric, unwavering and constant.
meanings.sent5: The ferroelectric's ability to store charge made it invaluable in the experiment.
